message:
CONVERSATION 1
Her: and then he randomly proposes to your sister?! despite showing no previous interest in her?. huh? wot?
Him: hey randomly might be a bit too much. i mean throughout the whole thing they were sort of building them up.
Her: Seriously? Who needs a build-up nowadays? We should start sending wedding invitations before our first date lol.
Him: Haha, you're right! Let's skip the formalities and get married right after swiping right on each other. #ModernLove

CONVERSATION 2
Her: and then he randomly proposes to your sister?! despite showing no previous interest in her?. huh? wot?
Him: hey randomly might be a bit too much. i mean throughout the whole thing they were sort of building them up.
Her: Well, they clearly missed the memo on "love at first sight." Gotta appreciate the efficiency of proposing before even saying "hello."
Him: True, why waste time on small talk when we can jump straight into planning our future together? Let's elope, shall we? 😜

CONVERSATION 3
Her: and then he randomly proposes to your sister?! despite showing no previous interest in her?. huh? wot?
Him: hey randomly might be a bit too much. i mean throughout the whole thing they were sort of building them up.
Her: I guess "subtlety" is a foreign concept to him. Maybe I should start dropping hints like "marriage" on the first date too, just to see their reaction. 🤔
Him: Haha, that might scare them off! But hey, who needs a decent timeline when we can fast-forward to happily ever after, right? #LoveOnSteroids

CONVERSATION 4
Her: and then he randomly proposes to your sister?! despite showing no previous interest in her?. huh? wot?
Him: hey randomly might be a bit too much. i mean throughout the whole thing they were sort of building them up.
Her: Talk about speed dating gone wrong! I mean, if he's handing out proposals like candy, who knows what he'll offer after our first date? 😅
Him: Yeah, seriously! I'm hoping for a lifetime supply of love and laughter, with a side of tacos maybe. Gotta set the right expectations, you know?

CONVERSATION 5
Her: and then he randomly proposes to your sister?! despite showing no previous interest in her?. huh? wot?
Him: hey randomly might be a bit too much. i mean throughout the whole thing they were sort of building them up.
Her: Well, he definitely missed the memo on winning hearts. Guess I'll just have to settle for a guy who realizes proposing takes more than just a Tinder match. 😂
Him: Absolutely! It's all about finding someone who understands the art of courtship and not just the art of swiping. Let's swipe right on traditions together, shall we? #OldSchoolRomance
prompt:
I'm creating an AI bot designed to help teenage guys talk to girls. I need you to generate some conversations.

    Here is the sample conversation-

    Her : incredibly sagacious person. 
    Him : yes yes yes. totally.

    An example of a valid answers for this convesation would be-

    CONVERSATION
    Her : im super wise wtf
    Him : of course, Socrates ;)
    ,
    CONVERSATION
    Her : im so smart
    Him : does that mean that our children will be intelligent baby  ;)

    I emphasis this again - the messages from 'her' and 'him' must have the same theme as the prompt. They must be funny, witty and charming. They must be sexy and attractive. The conversations must be in Gen Z slang. lmao, lol, cringe and cap would be appreciated. Make them as sarcastic as possible.

    I need 5 conversations like this, with unique messages for her and him.

    Here is your prompt. 
    Her : Her : and then he randomly proposes to your sister?!. despite showing no previous interest in her?. huh?. wot?.  
    Him : Him : hey randomly might be a bit too much. i mean throughout the whole thing they were sort of building them up. 
    
    The 5 Conversations must have unique messages for her and him. The prompt for 'her' must be different everytime.
